s: Personal finance education needs to start young. How? With the same universally loved childhood toy, the bank....but with a 21st century twist! money savvy generation Archives - Susan Beacham
s: Michael and I were in Chicago recently, seeing our daughters and visiting the friends of our youngest daughter. They are all now young adults and part of a generation of first grade kids I taught decades ago about the choices they have for money. We treated everyone to a nice dinner.
